content:
Hello

I have the following dependency in my IG located at : https://github.com/HL7/fhir-health-care-surveys-reporting-ig

<dependsOn id="bulkig">
<uri value="http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.uv.bulkdata"/>
<packageId value="hl7.fhir.uv.bulkdata"/>
<version value="1.0.0"/>
</dependsOn>

When I use the following :
Bulk Data Access IG the IG publisher resolves the link appropriately and no errors are reported.

However when I use the following: (Point to a sub page in the IG), a false positive error of broken link is reported, even though the link is valid and works as expected.
Bulk Data Access IG Authorization Section

Please let me know if I am doing something wrong or if this is indeed a false positive ?
is this committed so I can investigate?
yes this a problem in the way bulk-data is built, and not something you can fix. or even I can fix, really. FMG will give you a waiver on those broken links.
you should really reference 1.0.1 btw, but that won't fix the problem
